content: The wholesale division of Carvana can be involved in the car subscription service by providing a steady supply of vehicles to offer in different subscription tiers. The division can also help with acquiring and inspecting vehicles to ensure their quality and reliability, as well as managing the trade-in or selling of vehicles that are no longer needed in the subscription fleet. By partnering with the wholesale division, the subscription service can potentially reduce costs, increase the variety of vehicles available, and improve the overall customer experience.
